onboarding_screens.step1: Here you can find information on how to proceed.
onboarding_screens.step2: You can also find associations and activities near your home.
onboarding_screens.step3: It is an official application, supported by the state.
onboarding_screens.step4: The whole application is free! No need to pay.
onboarding_screens.help_1: This is to show you the associations and activities near you.
onboarding_screens.help_2: This is to show you the formalities and activities for your age group.
onboarding_screens.help_3: This is to show you the courses according to your level of French.
onboarding_screens.error_geoloc: Oh no! There's a problem. Please write the name of your town.
onboarding_screens.french_level: What is your level of French?
onboarding_screens.error_geoloc_acces: Oh no! There's a problem. Check your phone settings to make sure you have enabled location.
onboarding_screens.end: The application is ready. Now you can search for information.

explorer_screen.warning_nb_contents: You can see {{nbContent}} card, but not many for {{city}}
explorer_screen.adding_new_content: New cards are added every week. Get on a computer and help us write and translate cards!

profile_screens.reinit_app_button: Delete my information and start again
profile_screens.reinit_app2: Your information to filter the cards will be deleted. The application will then start again from the start.
profile_screens.delete_data: Your information (language, city, age and level of French) will be removed.

filters.no_french_level_filter: See cards for all levels of French

content_screen.error: Are you connected to the internet? Check and try again.

favorites_screen.add_content: When you are on an interesting card, click on the star.
favorites_screen.delete_content: Please note that this card will be deleted from "My cards".
favorites_screen.delete_all: Please note that all records will be deleted from "My records".

search_screen.try_new_search: Try again, check the spelling or use another keyword.

needs_screen.no_result: Sorry, we don't have any cards here yet.

about_screen.mission_1_subheader: Being a refugee means rebuilding a home, a network, and a career. These changes can result in losing one's bearings and ambitions. Réfugiés.info is a tool that allows refugees to reach their life goals more quickly with less stress.
about_screen.mission_2_header: Make administrative processes accessible and translated
about_screen.mission_2_subheader: Once asylum is granted by French authorities, refugees enter into common law, which brings about new administrative procedures. Réfugiés.info publishes practical information to make these procedures accessible. It also brings together volunteers to translate these procedures into different languages
about_screen.mission_3_header: Identify support systems throughout the country
about_screen.mission_3_subheader: Many programs have emerged in France to welcome and accompany refugees. These programs can suffer from a lack of publicity so may not benefit the greatest number of people. Réfugiés.info's mission is to shine a light on these programs and make them accessible
about_screen.problem_1_subheader: Better understanding fosters better welcoming. The words "migrant", "asylum seeker", or "refugee" can all have different definitions. Réfugiés.info is designed for statutory refugees, meaning people to whom France has granted international protection because their lives are threatened in their country of origin
about_screen.problem_2_subheader: Constant legislative evolution, multiplying organizations, and administrative complexity make it difficult to understand one's rights and duties. Réfugiés.info centralizes reliable, up-to-date, accessible information for this reason.
about_screen.problem_3_header2: Avoid breaks in the support system
about_screen.problem_3_subheader2: Moving, changing life project... With each new partner, you have to start from scratch. Réfugiés.info purports to offer refugees the opportunity to create a personal journey that they can easily share with their caregivers.
about_screen.contributive_1_subheader: Openness and transparency are at the core of Réfugiés.info. The source code of the site is publicly available. An open network helps identity needs and propose new solutions
about_screen.contributive_2_subheader: People on the ground are best able to identify and list local actions. Réfugiés.info allows different geographic areas to identify and promote their initiatives -- and to discover new ones
about_screen.contributive_3_subheader: By giving everyone the opportunity to easily contribute to the platform, like on Wikipedia, Réfugiés.info promotes new forms of micro-engagement, allowing new people to get involved in the support of refugees
about_screen.subheader2: implemented by the Diair and developed by the Mednum
about_screen.call_1: These organisations have signed a Call for Expression of Interest and participate in the evolution of the platform.
about_screen.call_2: If you represent an organisation linked to the integration of refugees and wish to join the adventure, download the call below and send it to nour@refugies.info. We will contact you to define the terms of our partnership.

global.error: Oh no! There's a problem. Please try again.
